title: Archery Game
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Hit the moving target with your arrow. Time your shots to score points
reactions: This game is licensed as public domain by Axiologic Research, and a gift to Albert-David Alboaie by the founder of Axiologic Research.
Feel free to copy and improve this game. Contact us on https://Boink.Games/addgame to review and include your games in our public suite. Make nice games for your children!
